item.title: Top 10 Tips from re:Invent 2018
item.description: re:Invent was a huge conference with many venues and over 60,000 attendees. If you donâ€™t plan properly, you will end up sitting in various shuttles, traveling up and down the strip. Here are some tips from my experience. Book your ticket early. The popular sessions fill up quickly and you will end up on the waiting list for most of them. When the re:Invent planner says that the next venue is 30 minutes away, trust that.
